Class Ennemi

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.entites.Ennemi
public class Ennemi extends Object
Represents an enemy unit in the dungeon. Manages its health, protection, status effects, and AI behavior during combat.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Ennemi(int pvMax, int xpReward, EnemyBehavior comportement)
    Constructs a new enemy instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ennemi

      public Ennemi(int pvMax, int xpReward, EnemyBehavior comportement)
      Constructs a new enemy instance.
      Parameters:
      pvMax - The maximum HP of this enemy.
      xpReward - The experience points gained by the hero upon defeat.
      comportement - The AI behavior module.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the behavior is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if PV max is not positive or XP is negative.

  • Method Details

    • choisirProchaineAction

      public EnemyAction choisirProchaineAction()
      Chooses the next action by delegating to its behavior interface. Called at the start of the hero's turn to announce the enemy's intent.
      Returns:
      The planned EnemyAction.

    • executerAction

      public void executerAction(Heros heros)
      Executes the action that was previously announced on the Hero. Called during the enemy's turn.
      Parameters:
      heros - The hero target.

    • recevoirDegats

      public void recevoirDegats(int montantDegats)
      Inflicts damage upon the enemy (called by the Hero's action). Handles Effect.DODGE charges and protection block.
      Parameters:
      montantDegats - The amount of damage to inflict.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the damage amount is negative.

    • gagnerProtection

      public void gagnerProtection(int montant)
      Increases the protection (block) of this enemy. Called by the enemy's behavior (ProtectAction).
      Parameters:
      montant - The amount of protection to add.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is negative.

    • estVivant

      public boolean estVivant()
      Checks if the enemy's current HP is greater than zero.
      Returns:
      true if the enemy is alive.

    • getxpReward

      public int getxpReward()
      Gets the XP reward granted to the hero upon defeating this enemy.
      Returns:
      The XP amount.

    • addStatus

      public void addStatus(Effect effect, int amount)
      Adds X stacks of a specific status effect to the enemy.
      Parameters:
      effect - The effect to add.
      amount - The number of stacks to add.

    • getStatus

      public int getStatus(Effect effect)
      Retrieves the current stack count (X value) of a specific status effect.
      Parameters:
      effect - The effect to check.
      Returns:
      The stack count, or 0 if the effect is absent.

    • triggerStartTurnEffects

      public void triggerStartTurnEffects()
      Triggers effects that occur at the START of the enemy's turn. Handles Effect.REGEN and Effect.BURN.

    • triggerEndTurnEffects

      public void triggerEndTurnEffects()
      Triggers effects that occur at the END of the enemy's turn. Handles Effect.POISON and the general degradation of status stacks.

    • getHp

      public int getHp()
      Gets the current health points (HP) of the enemy.
      Returns:
      Current HP.

    • clearActionAnnoncee

      public void clearActionAnnoncee()
      Clears the announced action, typically after the action has been executed.

    • getActionAnnoncee

      public EnemyAction getActionAnnoncee()
      Gets the action announced by the enemy for the current turn.
      Returns:
      The announced EnemyAction.

    • getMaxHp

      public int getMaxHp()
